name: Demo Day Finalist: Cow Break
description:
Cow Break by Megan L.

Game Summary:

My game is about a cow who has a best friend, but his best friend gets turned into a hamburger. He is sad and he knows he will get turned into a hamburger if he does not escape the farm. He needs to go through levels to get a key to escape the farm. In each level there is an item that unlocks the next level. In the next level there is another item that unlocks the next level and so forth. Eventually he escapes. He sees his best friend and he is happy. Jeff the Bull was the bull he thought was his friend, but he just looks like him.

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right 

  • Arrow keys to move
  • SPACE to shoot cheese
